Scrape¶

Scrape the Land Records Division. Give it the date range you want and it will download the HTML in /data/raw.

class landrecords.lib.scrape.Scrape(initial_date=datetime.date(2015, 4, 26), until_date=datetime.date(2015, 4, 26), rewrite=True)[source]¶

Navigate and scrape the Land Records Division.
